= Windows File System =

 * [http://www.reactos.org/generated/doxygen/ ReactOS Doxygen] is a great source of information on Windows kernel. We can't use hidden Windows structures or call non-exported functions, but we can learn how the kernel works (ex. looking at IoCreateStreamFileObject to understand why an IRP_MJ_CLEANUP is fired).
 * An OSR [http://www.osronline.com/article.cfm?article=280 article] on file system structures debugging.

=== Softwares ===

 * [http://www.zezula.net/ Ladislav Zezula] wrote two great softwares ([http://www.zezula.net/en/fstools/filespy.html Filespy] and [http://www.zezula.net/en/fstools/filetest.html FileTest]) for filesystem testing
